>> r8btree_interp_level_test

R8BTREE_INTERP_LEVEL_TEST
  Build a BTREE from sample values of a function.
  Then compare exact to interpolated values.
  The interpolation may be restricted to search only
  the first LEVEL levels of the BTREE.

       J       I    Left   Right  Parent

       2       2      -1       4       1
      18      18      -1      -1      10
      10      10      18      19       6
